name: Realm o' Deceit
description:
Realm o' Deceit is a top-down shooter, it's my entry for the Community Game Jam. The theme was, "The Game Is A Liar". Obviously, I was lying about the top-down shooter part (just like the game does, watch out.), it's a stealth game.

The controls are simple:
W, A, S, D to move (that's pretty much all you can do.)
V to activate the vision of truth.

It's just like other stealth games but with a twist. All that you see might not be true, you may need to use your ability of vision of truth to escape. Use the vision carefully because it's not unlimited, you need to wisely use the vision at the right time to help you complete the level.  The goal is to reach the green portal before the time runs out.

Hope you enjoy!!!

[Currently there are only 3 levels, and first 2 don't even count because they are tutorial levels. I could have added more and I probably will but I ran out of time so I decided to make just one challenging level (Not to good at that), because there are a lot of entries and in case I had like 10 levels, still no one would have bothered playing through all of it. After all the jam is about creativity, sticking to the theme and bringing your ideas to life, and I think I accomplished it.]
